records.text: The interplay between riddims, producers, and singjays/toasters is gloriously fractal; no matter how far you go, you can just keep going. Anthony Red Rose's "Tempo" was originally released in 1985 by King Tubby and has a very different, and very "King Tubby"-esque electric, stressed out, creeping vibe. Nothing like the "Fever Pitch" version https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EatWwMArlw4
